title: Bill Cosby, Cardi B, and Conor McGregor are making headlines.
itunes:title: Bill Cosby, Cardi B, and Conor McGregor are making headlines.
description:
Happy Humpday to you and yours. Today Bill Cosby's retrial has a huge secret reveal. Cardi B is white hot and her baby is in line for the good life. Conor McGregor faces serious charges after his incident and could face incarceration. Last and certainly not least, Steve shows us how to deal with suffering and pain, plus more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
